effect.en: Discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.
effect.fr: Défaussez les 3 cartes du dessus du deck de votre adversaire.
effect.es: Descarta las 3 primeras cartas de la baraja de tu rival.
effect.it: Scarta le prime tre carte del mazzo del tuo avversario.
effect.pt: Descarte as 3 cartas de cima do baralho do seu oponente.
effect.de: Lege die obersten 3 Karten des Decks deines Gegners auf seinen Ablagestapel.

description.en: Sandile's still not good at hunting, so it mostly eats things that have collapsed in the desert. It's called "the cleaner of the desert."
